diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $ABC$ is $30$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is $24$.
The length of the line $BC$ is $x$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$.
The lines $CB$ and $CA$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
